pr_title: Fixed a typo, minor cleanup of utility method

timeline.message: Fixed a typo, minor cleanup of utility method

timeline.bodyText: This line was deleted because it's not needed - the getPayload() ensures that we either get ReportEntry or empty and we filter out empties with Optional::isPresent. Another option is to remove the Optional::isPresent but that's considered a 'code smell' by sonar, I think.
timeline.author: Michael1993
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,11 +26,10 @@
 	static List<Map<String, String>> reportEntries(ExecutionEventRecorder recorder) {
 		return recorder
 				.eventStream()
-				.filter(event -> event.getType().equals(ExecutionEvent.Type.REPORTING_ENTRY_PUBLISHED))

replies.bodyText: But do we still get the correct ReportEntries (wondering about the REPORTING_ENTRY_PUBLISHED)?
replies.author: Bukama

replies.bodyText: Yes, because the only events in the recorder that have a ReportEntry.class type payload are the report entry events.
replies.author: Michael1993

replies.bodyText: There is only the REPORTING_ENTRY_PUBLISHED type in ExecutionEvent.Type that's related to report entries, so the filtering does nothing, I believe.
replies.author: Michael1993

timeline.message: Don't know how to trigger GitHub actions to build again :(
And everyone already went to sleep
